content: The sandbox environment seems to be down / not responding. Can you please confirm?

https://fhirsandbox2.kanta.fi/phr-resourceserver/baseStu3 takes a long time to respond and eventually responds with Error 500: java.lang.RuntimeException: Internal error
https://fhirsandbox2-auth.kanta.fi/phr-authserver-sandbox cannot be reached.
http://fhirsandbox.kanta.fi/phr-resourceserver-ui/ responds, but complains

Warning!
Failed to load capability statement, error was: ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.exceptions.FhirClientConnectionException: Encountered IOException when performing GET to URL http://fhirsandbox.kanta.fi/phr-resourceserver/baseStu3/metadata - java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
Hello and sorry for the late reply. We tested the environment and it seems to be working as expected at the moment. Please inform if you are able to reproduce the problem.

Hi! Trying to query the Sandbox using the UI at http://fhirsandbox.kanta.fi now returns "Error: HTTP 400 Bad Request: Invalid request: The FHIR endpoint on this server does not know how to handle GET operation[Observation] with parameters [[_pretty]]" to all queries. Known issue?

yes, a known issue, sort of - the server expects to have at least the patient-query parameter in Observation searches. The UI shows really poorly (read: doesn't) that the patient parameter is a required one. Add a valid patient reference to your query and it should work.
Querying for Patients in the Sandbox gives a response "Error: HTTP 500 Internal Server Error: Database connection error", needs a kick?

Works ok if you give it id: GET http://fhirsandbox.kanta.fi/phr-resourceserver/baseStu3/Patient?_id=12133&_pretty=true . I'll take note of this, this same behaviour occurs with some other resources and no-parameters query.
